word_mean: 有汗出，包括多种出汗表现。

sentence.Network_en: Profusely sweating and quivering with chills, he murmured his last words.
sentence.Network_cn: 出了很多汗的他打着冷战，含糊不清地说出了他的遗言。

sentence.Network_en: I'm sweating, my heart is pounding. I can't breathe.
sentence.Network_cn: 我浑身冒汗，心脏狂跳，呼吸困难。

sentence.Network_en: Mike shook his head, to unstick his hair from his sweating forehead.
sentence.Network_cn: 迈克晃了一下头，想把头发从汗涔涔的前额上甩开。

entry.def: Sweat is the salty colourless liquid which comes through your skin when you are hot, ill, or afraid.

example.ex: Both horse and rider were dripping with sweat within five minutes...
example.tran: 没过五分钟，马和骑手都大汗淋漓。

example.ex: He wiped the sweat off his face and looked around...
example.tran: 他擦了擦脸上的汗水并四处张望。

entry.def: When you sweat, sweat comes through your skin.

example.ex: Already they were sweating as the sun beat down upon them.
example.tran: 在阳光的强烈照射下他们已经汗流浃背。

entry.def: If someone is in a sweat, they are sweating a lot.

example.ex: Every morning I would break out in a sweat...
example.tran: 每天早上我都会出一身汗。

example.ex: Cool down very gradually after working up a sweat...
example.tran: 大量出汗后要慢慢降温。

entry.def: Sweats are the same as a sweatsuit or sweatpants .

entry.tran: 冒冷汗，出冷汗(指感到害怕或难堪)
entry.def: If someone is in a cold sweat or in a sweat, they feel frightened or embarrassed.

example.ex: The very thought brought me out in a cold sweat.
example.tran: 一想到这我就一身冷汗。

entry.def: If someone sweats it out, they wait anxiously for a situation to improve or be resolved, because they cannot do anything about it.

example.ex: The islanders can do little but sweat it out, wondering whether they will be forced to go and seek a new life elsewhere.
example.tran: 岛民不知道自己是否要被迫去往他处另谋生路，但却无能为力，只好干等。

entry.def: If a person says no sweat when you ask them about something or ask them to do something, they mean that it is not a problem or that it can be done quickly or easily.

example.tran: “非常感谢。”——“没什么，还需要别的吗？”

example.ex: No-one minds that she's a woman, that's no sweat at all.
example.tran: 没有人在意她是个女人，这完全没有关系。

means.word_mean: 1. the process of the sweat glands of the skin secreting a salty fluid;

auth_sentence.content: You will actually start sweating before you feel warm.

Sentence.sentence: I could spend months sweating over my own "paintings", but I'd produce something you wouldn't want to hang in your living room.
